title: 111_hr5942
content: FFSCC Act of 2010 - Authorizes the Comptroller of the Currency to provide for the organization, incorporation, examination, operation, regulation, and chartering of Federal Financial Services and Credit Companies (FFSCCs) to: (1) extend short-term and long-term credit. And (2) implement financial literacy programs. Imposes an annual fee upon FFSCCs payable to the Comptroller to offset the cost of implementing this Act. Directs the Comptroller to: (1) study rates and terms used in the extension of credit. And (2) develop a suite of FSCC financial products that will be fair to underbanked persons and economically viable for FFSCCs to offer.
